title: ZeroNet
desc: Imagine an internet without any censorship, with websites that’ll never be taken down, where freedom of speech will hold true meaning. Where the government won’t spy on you and social media giants won’t objectify you as a mindless consumer.
author: Nishita Dutta

title: Why isn't the globe represented upside down?
desc: This is an upside down map. Looks weird doesn’t it? They are predominantly used in Australia and New Zealand. After years of being bullied by other nations for their position on the Earth as South and lowly, these countries came up with the perfect reply. Also in a way making people wonder why is north up and south down?
author: Aashish Nehete
